column5: Very respectful guy here, easy going and educated, originally from Costa Rica, very open minded, I don't judge. You can feel at home, hang loose and enjoy your stay. I live in a one bedroom apartment near Downtown, Uptown, 4 minutes to Medical District, and a few blocks from Gay trendy Cedar Springs; walking distance to restaurants, bars etc. I STAY IN THE LIVING ROOM, very comfortable sofa bed , so you will have the bedroom all for yourself of course. I host for one guest at a time.
